docs.snippet: Preparations are underway on the red carpet for the big night, as one of Hollywood's most coveted awards events is moments away. Gavino Garay reports....

docs.snippet: The French film director Alain Resnais, known for classics such as "Hiroshima, Mon Amour", "Last Year at Marienbad" and the documentary "Night and Fog" about Nazi concentration camps, died on Sunday at the age of 91....
docs.lead_paragraph: The French film director Alain Resnais, known for classics such as "Hiroshima, Mon Amour", "Last Year at Marienbad" and the documentary "Night and Fog" about Nazi concentration camps, died on Sunday at the age of 91.

headline.main: Alain Resnais, Director of 'Hiroshima, Mon Amour', Dies Aged 91
headline.print_headline: Alain Resnais, Director of 'Hiroshima, Mon Amour', Dies Aged 91

docs.snippet: A toilet door, a gun, an iPhone — and some prosthetic legs. A stray bullet and the difference between a man and a woman screaming. All are pieces of the Oscar Pistorius puzzle that will likely be scrutinized at the Olympian's murder trial st...
docs.lead_paragraph: A toilet door, a gun, an iPhone — and some prosthetic legs. A stray bullet and the difference between a man and a woman screaming. All are pieces of the Oscar Pistorius puzzle that will likely be scrutinized at the Olympian's murder trial starting Monday.

headline.main: Pistorius Trial: The Pieces of the Puzzle
headline.print_headline: Pistorius Trial: The Pieces of the Puzzle

docs.snippet: It could all hinge on the toilet door....
docs.lead_paragraph: It could all hinge on the toilet door.

headline.main: Murder Trial of Pistorius to Start in South Africa
headline.print_headline: Murder Trial of Pistorius to Start in South Africa

docs.snippet: Perhaps atoning for past sins, Hollywood named the brutal, unshrinking historical drama "12 Years a Slave" best picture at the 86th annual Academy Awards....
docs.lead_paragraph: Perhaps atoning for past sins, Hollywood named the brutal, unshrinking historical drama "12 Years a Slave" best picture at the 86th annual Academy Awards.

headline.main: '12 Years a Slave' Rises Up at Academy Awards

docs.snippet: Expected winners at the Academy Awards were among the honorees; so were contenders who weren’t likely to get any other prizes this season....

docs.snippet: Big budget sci-fi flop "After Earth" and ensemble comedy "Movie 43" led the Razzie Awards on Saturday while annual favorite Adam Sandler went home empty-handed at the ceremony that mauled Hollywood's worst films and performances of the year....
docs.lead_paragraph: Big budget sci-fi flop "After Earth" and ensemble comedy "Movie 43" led the Razzie Awards on Saturday while annual favorite Adam Sandler went home empty-handed at the ceremony that mauled Hollywood's worst films and performances of the year.

headline.main: 'After Earth,' 'Movie 43' Sweep Razzies; Sandler Left Empty-Handed
